entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
